channel.title: SkyLearn Pre-Filter Test Feed - Clean ASCII
channel.description: Mixed UK articles for keyword filter validation. Clean ASCII comments and UTF-8 encoding.

item.title: BT Group opens new innovation hub in Birmingham’s Paradise development
item.description: BT relocates 1,000 staff to a new sustainable workspace in Birmingham city centre.

item.title: Taylor Swift to headline Wembley Stadium in summer 2026
item.description: Entertainment story unrelated to property or corporate relocation.

item.title: Google expands London campus with new data centre in King’s Cross
item.description: Tech giant increases footprint with additional infrastructure for AI operations.

item.title: JLL relocates Manchester team to refurbished Spinningfields offices
item.description: Property consultancy moves staff into new open-plan office at 3 Hardman Square.

item.title: UK inflation drops to 2.3% amid stable energy prices
item.description: Economic update not directly related to real estate or business relocations.

item.title: WeWork reopens refurbished co-working hub in Soho
item.description: Shared workspace operator completes fit-out of 45,000 sq ft flexible office building.

item.title: Legal & General announces new 250,000 sq ft office scheme in Bristol
item.description: Development will deliver Grade A offices and retail units near Temple Meads.

item.title: Storm expected to bring heavy rain across the UK this weekend
item.description: Weather forecast with no relevance to office or tenant moves.

item.title: Deloitte takes 150,000 sq ft pre-let at new City of London tower
item.description: The Big Four firm secures office space at a 40-storey development near Liverpool Street.

item.title: Amazon to open logistics and office complex in Milton Keynes
item.description: Expansion creates 800 jobs and combines warehousing with on-site offices.
